posts.postText:
1) Which server: Jail Break
2) Offender's name: evilcatz
3) Offender's SteamID: STEAM_0:1:37935219 
4) Explain the situation in detail: on a default day, and other previous rounds evilcatz has been reported freetranqing and rdm-ing prisoners without reason. I gave him multiple warnings and ultimately votekicked him out.
5) Were any specific server rules broken: RDM and free tranq
6) Any staff members on the server at the time of the offence: nope
7) Proof: http://steamcommunity.com/id/stratos83/screenshot/595825880196369839?tab=public
